GET /client/payments/v1/apps/primary_pro.skipReason: Requires an installed + fully connected payments app for the business (configured payments_gateway_type + external_<provider>_connected flag + additional connection checks). This prerequisite cannot be satisfied in the test environment via available APIs, so the endpoint will always 422 for most fresh businesses.

GET /client/payments/v1/packages/{packag.expectedOutcomeReason: 200 when package exists and client token is valid.

POST /client/payments/v1/cards.skipReason: Requires external prerequisite: connect a credit card processor / enable vaulting for the business (business.vaulting_enabled? must be true). Not possible to satisfy via API-only test in this environment.

POST /client/payments/v1/cards/save_card.skipReason: Test environment prerequisites not satisfiable: business does not have required feature flag (cp_add_new_cof) enabled, and client token cannot be acquired to execute endpoint as documented (client_jwt flow fails with 400).

POST /platform/v1/clients/payment/client.skipReason: Blocked by server-side 500 error and missing prerequisite test data (no client payment_requests available to obtain a valid pending payment_status_id).

GET /business/communication/sessions.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

GET /platform/v1/messages.expectedOutcomeReason: Backend implementation missing: Platform::V1::MessagesController only has create method, no index method implemented despite being documented in swagger and routes.rb

GET /v3/communication/available_phone_nu.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

GET /v3/communication/business_phone_num.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

POST /business/communication/channels.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Channels start as pending and are activated asynchronously via webhook callback from the communication-gw. Cannot fully test the lifecycle in the API validation environment.

POST /business/communication/messages.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

POST /business/communication/sessions.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

POST /business/communication/sessions/ty.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

POST /business/messaging/v1/channels.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

POST /business/messaging/v1/channels/typ.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

POST /platform/v1/numbers/dedicated_numb.expectedOutcomeReason: Requires valid external API key for third-party SMS service (Nexmo/Vonage) which cannot be provided in test environment

POST /platform/v1/numbers/twilio.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

POST /v3/communication/activity_messages.expectedOutcomeReason: Endpoint requires valid staff_uid but staff lookup validation fails with current test data. The endpoint has fallback logic to use business default staff when staff_uid is omitted, but validation requires staff_uid to be explicitly provided and the staff must be associated with the business and client.

POST /v3/communication/business_phone_nu.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /business/communication/channels/{ui.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

PUT /business/communication/messages/{me.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /business/communication/sessions/{ui.skipReason: Nexmo communication-gw endpoint. Requires webhook listener for async channel/session activation -- cannot be tested in validation environment.

PUT /platform/v1/numbers/dedicated_numbe.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /v3/communication/business_phone_num.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /v3/communication/voice_call_recordi.expectedOutcomeReason: Voice call recordings are only created when actual call recordings exist. Test environment voice calls do not have recordings attached.

GET /v3/integrations/import_job_items/{u.expectedOutcomeReason: Import job items are only created through complex file upload processes or existing import jobs. In test environments, no import job items typically exist, so the endpoint returns 404 'Import job line item with uid {uid} not found'. The endpoint structure and authentication work correctly.

POST /v3/integrations/import_jobs.expectedOutcomeReason: File upload endpoint requiring multipart/form-data with actual file attachment - cannot be tested with JSON body

GET /business/staffs/v1/daily_staff_sign.expectedOutcomeReason: The test framework cannot properly parse the filter[start_date][eq] and filter[end_date][eq] parameter format required by this endpoint. While the API works correctly when called directly (returns 200), the test_workflow consistently fails with 422. The endpoint requires nested bracket notation in query parameters that the test executor may not handle properly.

GET /v1/partners/accounts/{business_uid}.expectedOutcomeReason: This endpoint is deprecated and has been replaced by the Subscription API. Returns 401 as the directory is not permitted to change addons. This is expected behavior and counts as a pass.

GET /v1/partners/accounts/{business_uid}.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

POST /platform/v1/businesses/verify_audi.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

POST /v1/partners/accounts.expectedOutcomeReason: Creating a new business account is a side-effect-heavy operation that provisions a full business. Cannot safely create accounts in shared test environments.

POST /v1/partners/accounts/{business_uid.expectedOutcomeReason: Closing an account is a destructive operation (terminates subscription and blocks account). Cannot safely test in shared environment. The endpoint works  verified manually.
Reopening requires the account to be closed first. Test account is already open, so returns 422 'Invalid request - this business is already open'. Cannot close first because close is destructive.

POST /v3/license/bundled_offerings/bulk.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /business/staffs/v1/staffs/{uid}.expectedOutcomeReason: Directory token authentication requires proper business context setup that cannot be reliably configured in test environment. The endpoint requires current_actor[:acting_as_uid] from X-On-Behalf-Of header but directory token validation consistently returns 401 Unauthorized.

GET /business/payments/v1/scheduled_paym.expectedOutcomeReason: No scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment and recurring payments are not supported by the primary gateway. Without an active rule, get-by-uid returns a validation error.

GET /platform/v1/payment_statuses/{id}/v.expectedOutcomeReason: No valid coupon exists in the test environment. The endpoint returns 422 'Invalid Coupon' for non-existent coupon codes.

GET /v2/coupons/valid_coupons.expectedOutcomeReason: Backend error in coupon validation logic: 'undefined method `<' for nil:NilClass'. This deprecated endpoint has a bug in the CouponsAPI validation components. Use GET /v3/sales/coupons instead.

POST /business/payments/v1/card_requests.expectedOutcomeReason: Card requests require a configured payment gateway in this environment. The test business has no configured gateway, so the API returns 422.

PUT /business/payments/v1/scheduled_paym.expectedOutcomeReason: No active scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment. The API validates that only 'active' scheduled payment rules can be updated.
No scheduled payment rules exist in the test environment and recurring payments are not supported by the primary gateway. Without an active rule, cancel returns a validation error.

PUT /platform/v1/payment/checkout/.skipReason: Manual skip - endpoint not ready for testing

PUT /platform/v1/payment/client_packages.expectedOutcomeReason: The created client package has no booking redemptions. Cancel redemption requires an existing redemption, which cannot be created in this environment.

PUT /platform/v1/payment_statuses/{id}/a.expectedOutcomeReason: All coupon management endpoints (/v3/sales/coupons, /v2/coupons) return 500 errors, making it impossible to create or fetch valid coupon codes required for testing this endpoint. The endpoint itself responds correctly (422 Invalid Coupon) but requires functional coupon creation/listing to obtain test data.

PUT /v3/payment_processing/payment_gatew.expectedOutcomeReason: PUT requires the app token that owns the specific gateway. Using a different app's gateway returns 400 'Cannot access payment gateway for different app'.

POST /platform/v1/scheduling/waitlist.expectedOutcomeReason: No scheduled event instances available. Event services exist but no instances are scheduled, making waitlist functionality untestable without manual event instance creation through the UI.
